results.title: Metformin decreases plasma insulin levels and systolic blood pressure in spontaneously hypertensive rats.
results.text_hl: The treatment did not affect the plasma @CHEMICAL_Glucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005947 @@@glucose@@@ levels in any group. @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ treatment also attenuated the @<m>DISEASE_Symptom_Flare_Up</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000067251 @@@increase@@@ in systolic @DISEASE_Hematologic_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D006402 @@@blood@@@ pressure in the SHR (157 +/- 6.0 vs. untreated SHR 196 +/- 9.0 mmHg, P < 0.001) but had no effect in the WKY (134 +/- 3 vs. untreated WKY 136 +/- 4 mmHg, P > 0.05).

citations.NLM: Verma S, Bhanot S, McNeill JH. Metformin decreases plasma insulin levels and systolic blood pressure in spontaneously hypertensive rats. Am J Physiol. 1994 Oct;267(4 Pt 2):H1250-3. PMID: 7943368
